Package com.google.gxp.base

Interface Summary
GxpClosure Interface for a GXP template with all (explicit) parameters bound.
MarkupClosure Base type for all closures of markup (XML/SGML) for content-types.
 

Class Summary
GxpAttrBundle<T extends MarkupClosure> An attribute bundle.
GxpAttrBundle.Builder<T extends MarkupClosure> An attribute bundle builder.
GxpContext This is a context used for expanding GXP templates.
GxpTemplate This is the superclass of all GXP templates.
GxpTemplate.AnonymousGxpClosure Abstract base class for anonymous GxpClosures created by the GXP compiler.
GxpTemplate.TunnelingGxpClosure Abstract base class for GxpClosures created by the GXP compiler that need to use exception tunneling.
MarkupAppender<T extends MarkupClosure> Base Appender for all markup (XML/SGML) appenders, handles appending of java primitives, and other types that can be handled by all MarkupAppenders.
Message Message class manages a parameterized text string.
 

Exception Summary
GxpRuntimeException An exception class used for "tunneling" checked exceptions across generic interface boundaries.
